  • Uses of DinoActor in game.dinosaurs

    Subclasses of DinoActor in game.dinosaurs
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Allosaur
    An aggressive carnivorous dinosaur that can attack Stegosaur.
    class  Brachiosaur
    A herbivorous dinosaur that can eat fruits from trees, can destroy bushes and cannot be attacked by Allosaur.
    class  Pterodactyl
    A small carnivorous DinoActor that can fly.
    class  Stegosaur
    A herbivorous dinosaur that can eat fruits on the ground and on bushes, and can be attacked by Allosaur.
    Fields in game.dinosaurs with type parameters of type DinoActor
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.HashMap<DinoActor,​java.lang.Integer> Allosaur.victims
    A hashmap to keep track of all DinoActors that the Allosaur has attacked by the Allosaur before within 20 turns.
    Methods in game.dinosaurs with parameters of type DinoActor
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Allosaur.addAttackedVictims​(DinoActor victim)
    Add a DinoActor that was just attacked into the victims hashMap.
    void Allosaur.decrementAttackedPeriod​(DinoActor victim)
    Decrements the attacked period of the victim
    int Allosaur.getAttackedPeriod​(DinoActor victim)
    Returns the number of turns that the Allosaur has to wait before it can attack the victim again.
    boolean Allosaur.hasAttackedVictim​(DinoActor victim)
    Returns true if the Allosaur has attacked the same DinoActor within 20 turns, false otherwise.
    void Allosaur.removeVictim​(DinoActor victim)
    Remove a DinoActor from the victims hashMap.

  • Uses of DinoActor in game.movement

    Methods in game.movement with parameters of type DinoActor
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private static boolean FollowMateBehaviour.breedingPossible​(DinoActor actorAsDino, DinoActor anotherDino)
    Returns true if two DinoActors passed in are of different sex, same species and both capable to breed to indicate it is possible for mating to happen, false otherwise.
    (package private) abstract Location FollowBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
    Checks whether the Location destination has a target that the DinoActor is trying to find and returns it if true, otherwise null is returned.
    (package private) Location FollowBirthingSpotBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
    Checks if the DinoActor can lay an egg on destination, If yes, the destination will be returned for the DinoActor to move towards it, null will be returned otherwise.
    (package private) Location FollowFoodBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
    Checks if there is Food that the DinoActor can eat at location destination.
    (package private) Location FollowMateBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
    Checks if there is a mate that the DinoActor can follow at the location destination.
    (package private) Location FollowVictimBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
    Checks if there is a victim that the DinoActor can follow at the location destination.
    (package private) Location FollowWaterBehaviour.findTarget​(GameMap map, Location destination, DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns the Location destination if it is an instance of DrinkingGround, hence potentially has water, otherwise returns null.
    (package private) abstract boolean FollowBehaviour.motivatedToFind​(DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns true if the DinoActor has a reason / fulfills certain criteria to be able to follow something
    (package private) boolean FollowBirthingSpotBehaviour.motivatedToFind​(DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns true if a pregnant DinoActor is due to give birth, false otherwise.
    (package private) boolean FollowFoodBehaviour.motivatedToFind​(DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns true if the DinoActor is hungry to indicate that it will attempt to follow Food around it, false otherwise.
    (package private) boolean FollowMateBehaviour.motivatedToFind​(DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns true if the DinoActor can breed to indicate that it will attempt to follow another DinoActor to mate with it, false otherwise.
    (package private) boolean FollowVictimBehaviour.motivatedToFind​(DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns true if the DinoActor is hungry to indicate that it will attempt to follow another DinoActor to attack it for food, false otherwise.
    (package private) boolean FollowWaterBehaviour.motivatedToFind​(DinoActor dinoActor)
    Returns true if the DinoActor is thirsty hence wants to find water, returns false otherwise.
